item.title: Starting Daivergent Inc.
item.description: One week ago, I submitted paperwork to incorporate a company called Daivergent. If you remember from the first post of my blog, I was deciding between two projects. develop this new data collection service to yadda yadda yaddaâ€¦ build the next generation of group homes for adults with intellectual and developmental disabilities (IDD), addressing the signficant caregiver stress, growing prevalence of children with IDD transitioning into adulthood, and untapped potential of these adults to be contributing members of their communities.
